version_description: + New images
+ Minor bug fixes

Get ready for the biggest update yet with amazing new features!

- Import: Take a selfie or upload an image and color it in pixel style!
- New library: Easily browse through the new library organized by theme!
- EXCLUSIVE Xmas pictures coming soon: stay tuned in the next days!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

- New images!
- Fixed a bug on photo importing

Hi all, big update!

- Color by Number has been re-designed to look much cooler and smooth!
- We have revamped the import feature: now colors are much brighter and fun. Check it out!
- We've listened to your feedback and brought back the eraser and turned off the auto-scrolling feature

We hope you enjoy! Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Get ready for the biggest update yet with amazing new features!

- Import: Take a selfie or upload an image and color it in pixel style!
- New library: Easily browse through the new library organized by theme!
- EXCLUSIVE Xmas pictures coming soon: stay tuned in the next days!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Get ready for the biggest update yet with amazing new features!

- Pixelfy: Take a selfie or upload an image and color it in pixel style!
- New library: Easily browse through the new library organized by theme!
- EXCLUSIVE Xmas pictures coming soon: stay tuned in the next days!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Get ready for the biggest update yet with amazing new features!

- Import: Take a selfie or upload an image and color it in pixel style!
- New library: Easily browse through the new library organized by theme!
- EXCLUSIVE Xmas pictures coming soon: stay tuned in the next days!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team
+ Minor bug fixes
+ Minor bug fixes

Hi all! In this update we bring you an amazing new feature: Animations!

Now some of the picture will move after you finish painting it - look for the little camera icon on the library!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

This update is out to improve Color by Number's performance, providing you a happier experience while coloring!

--
Team Color by Number

Get ready for an awesome update!

- Paint with bucket: Paint regions of numbers instead of going pixel by pixel with this fun new feature!
- Delete image: Now you can delete (and restart) images in the "My Gallery" tab.
- Optimizations: Lots of improvements based on your requests and feedbacks. Keep them coming!
- Get ready: Exclusive Valentine's Day images coming soon!

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Hi all! In this update we bring you an amazing new feature: Filters! Now you can finalize your art with cool pixel shapes and effects!

We've also made other cool improvements thanks to your feedback:
- We've fixed a bug that prevented some animated images to move after you finished coloring them
- When painting with the swipe movement, the screen now follows your finger

P.S.: We are listening to you regarding the eraser. We are working on it and will bring it back in the next version.

Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

It's Valentine's Day on Color by Number! Check out our exclusive Valentine's Day pictures and send love to your special one!

Happy Coloring!

P.S.: We are listening to you regarding the eraser. We are working on it and will bring it back in the next version.

--
Color by Number Team

Hi all, big update!

- Color by Number has been re-designed to look much cooler and smooth!
- We have revamped the import feature: now colors are much brighter and fun. Check it out!
- We've listened to your feedback and brought back the eraser and turned off the auto-scrolling feature

We hope you enjoy! Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Hi all, we have a new big feature on Color by Number: 3D coloring!
- Enjoy dozens of cool and fun 3D models to color, with new models every day!
- Place them in the real world with Augmented Reality!

We hope you enjoy! Happy Coloring!

--
Color by Number Team

Hi All! We are listening to your feedbacks and have made changes to the layout to improve your coloring experience.

We hope you enjoy! Happy Coloring!

-- 
Color by Number Team
Bug fixes

Hi All! New feature on this version.. Surprise Image! Find mysterious images in the library and reveal them by coloring!

We hope you enjoy! Happy Coloring!

-- 
Color by Number Team
Minor bug fixes
